recap_documents.description: MINUTE ORDER of 3/28/03 by Hon. Blanche M. Manning : For the reasons stated on the attached memorandum and order, plaintiffs' motion for reversal [16-1] is gratned, in part, and defendant's motion for affirmance [17-1] is denied. The court  remands this case to the Social Security Administration pursuant to sentece four of 42 U.S.C. Section 405(g) for further proceedings consistent with this opinion. The Clerk is directed to enter a Fed.R.Civ.P. 58 judgment terminating the case. Entered Memorandum and Order. Terminating case . Mailed notices by judge's staff (cem)
